review: This is a standard 1 inch plastic-covered cardboard loose-leaf binder with the usual type of toothed interlocked rings. Certain more expensive models have an improved ring-locking mechanism which is less likely to catch on individual sheets of paper. That said, this binder should be OK as long as I don't add too many sheets of paper to it; I would say 100 should be the limit rather than the stated 175.
productTitle: Avery Economy View Binder with 2-Inch Round Ring, White, Pack Of 4 (19202)
